description: Main entry point for a Flutter application named Personal Notes. It sets up the app widget, providers, themes, and initial screen.

classes.name: NotesApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application that sets up providers, theme, and home screen.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that initiates the app by running NotesApp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the root app, providing NotesProvider and setting up MaterialApp.
